info.task: navigate backwards to a text input inside a form landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards to a text input inside a form landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterFormAndHideBottomControls
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the form landmark, and hides the 'Bottom' link and 'Add Contact' button

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Phone' text input.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Phone' text input.
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Add Contact', is conveyed
Name of the input, 'Phone', is conveyed
The ability to enter text into the input is conveyed
